metadata.title: CVE-2020-12417 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Due to confusion about ValueTags on JavaScript Objects, an object may passthrough the type barrier, resulting in memory corruption and a potentiallyexploitable crash. *Note: this issue only affects Firefox on ARM64platforms.* This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 68.10, Firefox < 78,and Thunderbird < 68.10.0.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
